🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":624298,"totalDownVotes":47609,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":63163,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3790645,"totalDownVotes":312640,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":76233,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3240273,"totalDownVotes":284392,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":76927,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":533584,"totalDownVotes":37469,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":43865,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2790981,"totalDownVotes":365210,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":38020,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons! 

Conquer the day in fast paced arcade gameplay, from bazookas to spell books, each weapon will keep you guessing on what's next! 

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

"},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2203105,"totalDownVotes":301400,"universeId":140239261,"name":"💙 MeepCity 💙","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":89964,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙💙 The game that is Powering Imagination! And join our Roblox group/community!"},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2078572,"totalDownVotes":287509,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":48049,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌼New Update 5/3! Check the in-game update log in new servers (the book with the !) for full details!

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":290386,"totalDownVotes":33143,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"『New STAND』 Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":21219,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and much more! Please read the help section in the game's loading screen.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK DOWN BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

This game was created by UzuKee with the help in development from the Bizarre Studios team.

Disclaimers:
The game contains flashy lights and imagery that may cause discomfort or seizures to those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. In VIP servers, Item spawning is x1.3 more rare and long. You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4366084,"totalDownVotes":591080,"universeId":245662005,"name":"🕵️‍♀️ LIMITED! Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":32626,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"The latest Jailbreak update is here! 
🕵️‍♀️ THE AGENT! A spy car that shoots rockets! Limited time to buy!
👮‍♀️ INTERROGATOR! Affordable Police SUV!
🔥 PIT MANEUVERS! Watch out criminals! 
⚽️ New Soccer Ball reward: Bonded Wheels!
🎉 5B Visits Garage Spoiler! TY for getting us here!! ❤️
Next update: An all new robbery!!


🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over four billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1428193,"totalDownVotes":119555,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":37877,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

--- 25% more gold!"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1025253,"totalDownVotes":51672,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":24634,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2150825,"totalDownVotes":661547,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":56744,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Isso seria a descrição para um obby gerado aleatoriamente com absolutamente nenhum checkpoint mas o Roblox fica a colocando como [ Content Deleted]

Donos de servidores-VIP podem usar os commandos /setLength [3-150] para mudar o tamanho da torre seguido por
/skip para ir à próxima torre

Se você acha que está preparado você pode tentar a torre contendo todas as 150 seções aqui: https://www.roblox.com/games/2127551566/THE-Tower-of-Hell"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":147696,"totalDownVotes":8069,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":13853,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":273752,"totalDownVotes":143620,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":25623,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2333055,"totalDownVotes":245099,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":45316,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Controls:
Pick up items / Use items - Click (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or Right Trigger (Controller)
Crouch / Place trap - CTRL (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or B (Controller)

Credits:
IK3As - Chapter 3, Chapter 7, Chapter 9, Chapter 11 Builder, Additional Chapter 8 Building, Book 2 Chapter 2 and 5 Building
Optikk - Build Mode
TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":189940,"totalDownVotes":31124,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ BLEACH ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":11005,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Os testadores beta obtêm os caracteres dlc gratuitos.

Controles:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Bloco
Ataque Básico: Mouse1
Espaço + Mouse1: ataque aéreo
Combine ataques básicos e ataques aéreos para descobrir novos combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 para os movimentos especiais do seu personagem.
Transformação: G

Scripters: Snakeworl, jjjakey, Melon_Sensei
Construtores: Chicken_Man
Colaboradores: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA"},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":700961,"totalDownVotes":94711,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🦌 [DESERT BOSS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":16743,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Islands!

🌲 Build your own island
👩‍🌾 Create huge farms
🐔 Raise animals
💸 Sell items to make money
⚔️ Loot monsters and bosses
👨‍🍳 Cook tasty delicacies
🔥 And more!

Controls:

👑 Creators:
SnickTrix (https://twitter.com/lukechatton)
spleenhook (https://twitter.com/spleenhook)

🥁Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":232213,"totalDownVotes":20662,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[ DRAGON 🐉 ] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":20061,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

Level Cap: 3100
There are 30 Physical Fruits In Game

- Fruits spawn in the map every 30 Minutes
- First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1192690,"totalDownVotes":68002,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":14590,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1799871,"totalDownVotes":140550,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":7618,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":7083660,"creatorName":"StealthWhale","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":50686,"totalDownVotes":5179,"universeId":2383988292,"name":"[WORLD 16] 🐝 Beeface: Be a Bee!","placeId":6410967163,"playerCount":27597,"imageToken":"T_6410967163_718b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"📢 WORLD 17 AT 60K LIKES!
📢 UPDATE: WORLD 16 is here!

FEATURES: 
🐝 Experience the busy life of a bee!

🌸 Thousands of flowers await you! 
👑 Show your skills and become the Queen Bee!

Please join our group to stay tuned 🙂 https://www.roblox.com/groups/7083660/StealthWhale"},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":518515,"totalDownVotes":42434,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":10809,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Nesse mundo, ninguém consegue sobreviver sozinho. Junte-se com amigos e lute contra varias ondas de zumbis, chefões, ganhe moedas, suba de nível e compre novas torres! Se você esta procurando por um desafio, tente ir contra chefões mais fortes em dificuldades mais altas!

👥💵Entre no group para ter +100$ de dinheiro inicial!
https://www.roblox.com/groups/4914494
👍Dê joínha e favorite para mais atualizações de qualidade!🌟
⚠️Este jogo está em beta então fique atento aos bugs!⚠️

🛠️ATUALIZAÇÕES🛠️
+ CAIXA DE BRINQUEDOS 📦
+ MAPA FEBRE DA PRIMAVERA 🌼
+ TORRES MELHORADAS
+ Bugs consertados 🛠️

Leia o log de atualizações: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/tower-defense-simulator-update-log

Créditos:
🛠️Dono/Desenvolvidor principal: BelowNatural
📜Programador: Razuatix
🔨Builders: BiscuitTurtleKid & Beefchoplets
🎹Compositor Musical: Phoqus
🔊Designer de SFX: BiddinUp"},{"creatorId":2600997,"creatorName":"Cracky4","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":484884,"totalDownVotes":51957,"universeId":1318971886,"name":"Break In (Story)","placeId":3851622790,"playerCount":24404,"imageToken":"T_3851622790_a992","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¡Dia de mudanza! Se pueden apreciar balcones de ladrillo blanco, una ausencia de cortinas, pinturas llenas de nostalgia que decoran las paredes y todo esto envuelto en el aroma a un nuevo hogar. Una escalera de madera lleva hacia el piso superior donde 12 camas esperan tontamente por sus dueños.

La noche podria ser tormentosa pero hay 11 caras nuevas para que conozcas y una casa llena de secretos esperando a ser descubiertos.

Oh y los asesinos rabiosos. Casi me olvido de mencionar los asesinos rabiosos.

Sinceramente, tu amigis
Cracky4"},{"creatorId":409640380,"creatorName":"MUCDICH","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":162267,"totalDownVotes":17709,"universeId":2294168059,"name":"The Mimic [Remastered]","placeId":6243699076,"playerCount":12409,"imageToken":"T_6243699076_ec39","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Chapter 3 is finally here! 

CONTROLS:
Shift to Run for PC
L2 to Sprint for XBOX

ABOUT:  You go back to your old high school in hopes of finding your missing group of friends, however, you encounter a mysterious entity that lurks within your school. Eventually, you venture into the unknown depths of a mysterious world.


WARNING: This game contains Flashing lights, Loud Noises & Jumpscares!


Join the group for updates and your support:
https://www.roblox.com/groups/9482918/CTStudio#!/about

This game is not based on the movie. It was coincidentally made with the same title.


For best experience use headphones.


Tags: Horror, Abandoned, Lost, Mystery, Spooky, Terror, Scary, Creepy, Pineapples, School, Allergies, Japan."},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":912886,"totalDownVotes":118826,"universeId":892043755,"name":"[🏆UPDATE + SALE🏆] Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":8197,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🚨 UPDATE 75 🚨
🏆 New Bubble Pass for season 20!
💪 Competitive leaderboards are back!
🥚 New egg in the Shadow Realm (Corrupted Egg)
🐶 16 new pets!
🔥 ??
💰 60% off sale on all gamepasses!
💸 50% off sale on all boosts!
🐰 Easter event has ended! We hope you enjoyed our biggest egg hunt yet
🎮 Bug fixes for gamepad auto-hatch.

Subscribe to the Rumble Studios YouTube channel to redeem exclusive rewards, including a special pet, more inventory space, and free boosts! 👍 Tutorial: https://youtu.be/NweUYpsrS3c

Welcome to Bubble Gum Simulator! Blow bubbles to reach new heights in the clouds. Sell your bubbles or collect coins to buy upgrades! Hatch pets as companions to help you on your adventure.

A game by Rumble Studios."},{"creatorId":1730435200,"creatorName":"SnowdustDev","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":155349,"totalDownVotes":67936,"universeId":1852226622,"name":"Gacha Online| Custom OC RP⭐ (Roleplay)","placeId":5289509545,"playerCount":22324,"imageToken":"T_5289509545_1eec","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"➡️ Gacha Online's content is 100% free, supported by your donations and premium playtime! ⬅️

( Game Version 1.415 - 3/6/21 )

~~~~~~~ Welcome to Gacha Online BETA! ~~~~~~~ (*・ω・)ﾉ
Customize your Gacha OCs in Roblox, just like Gacha Life -- ⭐BUT MULTIPLAYER!⭐

Welcome to Southwest Florida! Based around the Bonita Springs area, Southwest Florida is a roleplay game that offers a variety of jobs, vehicles, and more! 

⚠️ This game is not complete and some features are missing.

⚠️ This is a large game and lower end PCs, laptops, phones, and tablets may experience performance issues.

Controls
- "V" to toggle walk/jog, hold "Shift" to run
- Semi & Auto: "E" to upshift, "Q" to downshift ("X" and "Y" on Xbox)
- Manual: Use the "Shift" key ("RB" on Xbox) to control clutch while shifting
- Hold left-CTRL while accelerating to wheelie on a bike
- Cops & criminals have to enable PvP (bottom right) in order to do damage
